title: POCO M3 Pro 5G (Cool Blue, 128 GB)  (6 GB RAM)

product_specification.In The Box: Handset, Power Adaptor, USB Type-C Cable, SIM Ejector Tool, Protective Case, Quick Start Guide and Warranty Card
product_specification.Other Display Features: AdaptiveSync Display: 30Hz/50Hz/60Hz/90Hz, Color Gamut: NTSC 70.8% (Typ), 20.9 Aspect Ratio, 400 nits (Typ) Brightness, Reading Mode 3.0, Sunlight Mode, Touch Sampling Rate of 180Hz, Corning Gorilla Glass 3
product_specification.Operating Frequency: 2G GSM: B2/B3/B5/B8, 3G WCDMA: B1/B2/B5/B8, 4G FDD-LTE: B1/B3/B5/B8, 4G TDD-LTE: B40/B41, 5G NSA: n1/n3/n40/n77/n78, 5G SA: n78
product_specification.Primary Camera Features: Triple Rear Camera Setup: 48MP Main (0.8μm Pixel Size, f/1.79 Aperture, 6P Lens, AF, FOV: 79 Degree) + 2MP Macro (1.75μm Pixel Size, f/2.4 Aperture, 3P Lens, FF, FOV: 84 Degree) + 2MP Depth (1.75μm Pixel Size, f/2.4 Aperture, 3P Lens, FF, FOV: 83 Degree), Camera Features: Timed Burst, 48 MP Mode, AI Camera, AI Beautify, AI Portrait Mode with Bokeh and Depth Control, Google Lens, Night Mode, Movie Frame, HDR, Digital Zoom up to 10x, Face Recognition, Pro colour, Video Features: Video Macro Mode, Time-lapse Video, Short Video, Slow Motion Video, EIS
product_specification.Secondary Camera Features: 8MP Front Camera (1.12um Pixel Size, f/2.0 Aperture, 4P Lens, FF, FOV: 77.8 Degree), Camera Features: Timed Burst, AI Beautify, AI Portrait Mode with Bokeh and Depth Control, Movie Frame, HDR, Selfie Timer, Screen Softlight, Palm Shutter
product_specification.Video Recording Resolution: Rear Camera: 1080p and 720p (at 30fps), Slow-motion: 720p (at 120fps), Front Camera: 1080p (at 30fps)
product_specification.Sensors: Proximity Sensor, Ambient Light Sensor, Accelerometer, Gyroscope, Electronic Compass, IR Blaster
product_specification.Other Features: UFS 2.2 Storage, 22.5W Fast Charger, Side-mounted Fingerprint Support, Face Unlock, Dual App Support
product_specification.Audio Formats: MP3, FLAC, APE, DSF, M4A, AAC, OGG, WAV, WMA, AMR, AWB
product_specification.Video Formats: MP4, M4V, MKV, AVI, WMV, WEBM, 3GP, 3G2, ASF
product_specification.Warranty Summary: One Year Warranty for Handset, 6 Months for Accessories

product_description.Fast and Powerful: The POCO M3 Pro 5G provides fast performance along with low latency and quick connection. This way, you can enjoy speed and power with this mobile phone.
product_description.Impressive Performance: This mobile phone features the MediaTek Dimensity 700 processor and comes with the UFS 2.2 WriteBooster and impressive RAM to ensure that you can enjoy top-notch performance.
product_description.Smooth Visuals: Thanks to the 16.5 cm (6.5) FHD+ display and a high refresh rate of this mobile phone, you can enjoy smooth visuals while streaming content, gaming, and more. Its Smart display also switches between refresh rates (based on the onscreen content) so that the battery power is saved and you can enjoy an optimal viewing experience.
product_description.Elegant Design: With a Switchblade design, this mobile phone also boasts an elegant 3D curved back and a glossy finish, making it an aesthetically pleasing device. You can use the side-mounted fingerprint sensor for convenient usage.
product_description.48 MP Triple Camera: This mobile phone comes with a 48 MP triple camera (48 MP + 2 MP + 2 MP) setup that includes depth and macro sensors. You can also use other features, such as timed burst, night mode, and slow-motion, and more so that you can better your photography skills.

All in all this phone is a good buy for me and you can go for it too.

Yesterday I received this mobile... After one day of usage I give this feedback....

1) Camera

Front Camera. -. I give 4 / 5.. If u r a selfie addict its not for u...

Rear Camera - 5 / 5.. Really Awesome...

2) Battery 🔋 - 4 / 5 Charging time is high...I put charge in 67% it charge 97% for 45 min.. for 30% of charge it takes 45 minutes... I think this mobile is not have a fast changing support....

3) Display - 5 / 5 .. Quick responsive touch.. Excellent.. I don't know how to tell in words... Its just awesome...

4) Processor. - 5 / 5.. Pretty good.. Iam not a gamer... So this processor is enough for me...

5) Fingerprint - 5 / 5.. It is mounted in power button... Its really superb.... It response very quickly...

6) Call - Record option is not available in the default phone call app...

7) Storage - 4 / 5... I buy 128gb variant.. System occupied just 16.3 gb.. There is no dedicated memory card slot... It's a hybrid slot.. u can use 2 Simcards at a time or 1 simcard and 1 memory card at a time... Think before buy it...

8) Look - The Cool Blue colour is very aggressive.... 😍😍

Overall i happy with this mobile... I like it, sorry I love it 😍😍.. Thanks FLIPKART for ur fast delivery...

Writing this review after using for a month.
1. Good mobile with decent specs under this price category.
2. Design of the phone especially the back side is different and eye catchy.
3. Performance wise, this phone delivers a good result and decent device for gaming.
4. Camera is decent but not upto the mark, need few tweaks to make it better. I hope it will be solved in upcoming updates.
5. Could sense some lack in 90hz while scrolling the new feeds in Insta, FB etc. (Better to use in 60hz).
6. Device comes with pre-installed google Apps like Phone, Contacts, Messages, Home etc.
5. Battery backup is best.

Overall this device is a best one under this budget.
